title: Ep 183: Iconic Hairstylist Guido Palau's First Podcast Ever!
itunes:title: Ep 183: Iconic Hairstylist Guido Palau's First Podcast Ever!
itunes:subtitle: Guido Palau, Redken's global creative director, has been setting hair trends in the fashion world—and, frankly, the entire world—for years. Now he's opening up about his personal story, his favorite collaborators, the work he's proudest ...
description:
Guido Palau, Redken's global creative director, has been setting hair trends in the fashion world—and, frankly, the entire world—for years. Now he's opening up about his personal story, his favorite collaborators, the work he's proudest of, and what he wants to do next. We are so freaking excited to interview him for his very first podcast! Also in this episode: VSCO girls and Jaclyn Hill's second attempt at a makeup line.


Want more Fat Mascara?

Our secret Facebook group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand

Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jennedit

Twitter: @fatmascara

Website: fatmascara.com
